Givat Shmuel.title: Givat Shmuel
Givat Shmuel.byline: Givat Shmuel (Samuel Hill) is a small city of nearly 30,000 in Israel.

Giverny.title: Giverny
Giverny.byline: Giverny is a small French village 80 km to the north-west of the capital city Paris, within the valley of the river Seine and the northern region of Upper Normandy.
